question:
You have a friend who lives in a different country. You will organise a party soon and have thought to use a foreign recipe. Write a letter to the friend asking for a recipe from his/her country for the party you are organizing.
In your letter,


tell your friend about the party
ask for the recipe
explain why you need the recipe from his/her country
text: I hope you are fine there and doing great in your life. You will be glad to know that finally, I am going to throw a party next month which I couldn't due to Covid-lock down.
This party will be organised in my home as you know I have a big lawn that is perfect for this event. Moreover ,all my office peers are invited and Indian traditional attire has been decided.

Apart from this the theme for cuisine is Intercontinental. Most of my colleagues love to eat Italian food.I am good at making pasta but I am not sure about the recipe for Pizza.I want you to guide me on this.

I remember that when I visited your accommodation last year  you welcomed me with your homemade pizza and the taste of it was delicious.I can not rely on anybody else for this particular food. Since this dish is the signature dish of your nation and I want to give an authentic taste to my guests while they eat pizza.
I am counting on you so send the recipe as soon as possible because I need to practice it before I cook the final one.
